name: The Incredible Laboratory
overview: Welcome to the Incredible Laboratory! You are a MAD SCIENTIST, world famous for creating MONSTERS out of a variety of chemicals (such as Fuzzy Mold, Bubbling Mud, and StinkySocks). The only problem is, sometimes you forget what chemicals create which body parts for monsters! That is why you must take a shelf full of chemicals and experiment with them to see what monster parts they create. The Wizard suggests that you take nifty notes and record your results so you don't have to rely upon your MAD memory!
